    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AdminController
     
    AdminService
     
    ApiErrorResponse
    This is our standard DTO for sending structured error responses to the client.
    AppConfig
     
    AuthController
     
    Candidate
     
    CandidateRepository
     
    CandidateTransformer
    A CandidateTransformer is responsible for transforming the data into the appropriate model classes.
    ChatController
     
    ChatHistoryController
     
    ChatMessage
     
    ChatMessageDTO
     
    ChatMessageRepository
     
    CompositeVotesTransformer
    This special transformer can send data to two other transformers at the same time.
    ConstituencyController
    Controller responsible for serving Constituency (Kieskring) data.
    DataInitializer
     
    DataSeeder
     
    dbPartyService
     
    DefinitionTransformer
    A DefinitionTransformer is responsible for transforming the data into the appropriate model classes.
    DutchCandidateTransformer
     
    DutchConstituencyVotesTransformer
    Handles exclusively the processing of Constituency (Kieskring) aggregated votes.
    DutchDefinitionTransformer
    Transformer for handling the structure of the constituencies, municipalities and the parties.
    DutchElectionParser
    Processes the XML data files for the Dutch elections.
    DutchElectionService
    A service for handling election data.
    DutchElectionService.ConstituencyResultDto
     
    DutchElectionService.PartyResultDto
     
    DutchMunicipalityTransformer
    Handles exclusively the processing of Municipality (ReportingUnit) votes.
    DutchNationalVotesTransformer
    Just prints to content of electionData to the standard output.
    DutchRegionTransformer
     
    DutchResultTransformer
    Just prints to content of electionData to the standard output.
    Election
     
    ElectionController
     
    ElectionController.MunicipalityDataDto
     
    ElectionController.MunicipalityResultDto
     
    ElectionNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when an election with a specific ID cannot be found
    ElectionsApplication
     
    EMLHandler
    This EMLHandler is a SAX2 event handler that is being called by a SAX2 parser while it is processing an EML-XML file.
    Gemeente
     
    GemeenteRepository
     
    GlobalExceptionHandler
    This is our Global Exception Handler.
    JwtTokenFilter
     
    JwtTokenProvider
     
    Kieskring
     
    KieskringDTO
     
    KieskringRepository
     
    LoginRequest
    A data transfer object for receiving login credentials from a user.
    LoginResponse
    A DTO for sending back a JWT token after a successful login.
    MunicipalityResult
    We renamed this class from 'KiesKring' to 'MunicipalityResult'.
    NationalResultController
    Controller responsible for serving calculated results and data retrieved from the database.
    NationalResultDto
     
    NationalResultService
    Service responsible for handling logic related to national results.
    OpenApiConfig
    Configuration class for OpenAPI (Swagger) documentation.
    Party
     
    PartyController
    Controller responsible for serving all data related to Political Parties.
    PartyRepository
     
    PartyService
     
    PartyTransformer
    Transformer responsible for converting raw data objects (simulated XML entities like AffiliationIdentifier) into the application's core data Model (Party)
    PathUtils
    A helper-class used for traversing a directory structure which contains the Dutch election data.
    PoliticalParty
    Represents a registered political party in the Dutch election.
    Province
     
    ProvinceController
     
    ProvinceRepository
    Spring Data JPA repository for the Province entity.
    Region
     
    RegionTransformer
     
    ScaledElectionResultsService
     
    SecurityConfig
     
    TagAndAttributeNames
    Definitions of all the known tags and their attributes.
    User
     
    UserController
    API Controller for managing users.
    UserRepository
    Repository interface for User data.
    UserService
     
    VotesTransformer
    A VotesTransformer is responsible for transforming the data into the appropriate model classes.
    WebSocketConfig
     
    XmlPartyService
    Service layer responsible for business logic, data access, and orchestrating the transformation.
    XmlPartyService.AffiliationIdentifier
    Inner class to mock the relevant XML structure for JAXB/parsing simulation.
